Summary: lites in a curved shape in two different spots .not your normal star set up.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Malverne
There were no other sightings in Malverne on or around April 14th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was putting out the garbage and I looked up . at first I thought the stars are in a curved pattern and I studied it for a while, thats not your typical placement of stars. went back in to the house. a few minutes went by I went back and looked again , still there. continued to look around and seen another group of stars in that same pattern . it was four lites in a curve, also saw several small planes in the area ,more than usual. I want to know if there were any sightings in our area last nite.by the way I am 2 miles from Kennedy airport. The nite sky had a lot of stars out but yet it was very cloudy.
